docs.summary: An existing post was closed for further comments.
An existing post was moved to a different category.
An existing post was opened for further comments.
An existing post was pinned to the top of the post list.
An existing post was reported as inappropriate.
An existing post was unpinned from the top of the post list.

members.name: entityId
members.doc: ID of the entity associated with the event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether the event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (for example, [GDPR](https://support.wix.com/en/article/gdpr-frequently-asked-questions)). For advanced users.

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc:
Records can be sorted by:
rank
postCount
postViewCount

members.name: order
members.doc: Records can be sorted in ascending (default) or descending order.

members.name: additionalCommentReactions
members.doc: Defines what additional reactions may be applied on the comment under the posts created in this category.

members.name: additionalPostReactions
members.doc: Defines what additional reactions may be applied on the posts created in this category.

members.name: categoryAccess
members.doc: Whether all site visitors and members (`PUBLIC`), all members (`MEMBERS_ONLY`), or only specific members and groups of members with roles, badges or paid subscriptions (`PRIVATE`) can access posts in category.

members.name: commentInteraction
members.doc: Defines what interactions may be applied on the comment under the posts created in this category, vote or like.

members.name: groups
members.doc: Ids of groups which can access category if categoryAccess is PRIVATE.

members.name: mainCommentReaction
members.doc: Defines which icon will be used for main reaction (like) on the comment under the posts created in this category.

members.name: mainPostReaction
members.doc: Defines which icon will be used for main reaction (like) on the posts created in this category.

members.name: noMemberPosting
members.doc: Whether only admins and moderators can write posts in category.

members.name: postCount
members.doc: Total number of posts in category.

members.name: postInteraction
members.doc: Defines what interactions may be applied on the posts created in this category, like or multiple reactions.

members.name: postTypes
members.doc:
List of post type that Category supports.
Deprecated on '2021-08-03'.

members.name: postViewCount
members.doc: Total number of post views in category.

members.name: extraFields
members.doc: Array of extra category fields to be added in the response. `UNKNOWN` must not be passed.

members.name: category
members.doc: Retrieved category for the provided category ID.

members.name: extraFields
members.doc: Array of extra category fields to be added in the response. `UNKNOWN` must not be passed.

members.name: categoryId
members.doc: ID of the read posts category.

members.name: extraFields
members.doc: Array of extra category fields to be added in the response. `UNKNOWN` must not be passed.

members.name: sort
members.doc: Array of sort objects (e.g.,  [{ fieldName: rank, order: Order.ASC }] )

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of records that match the filters.

members.name: fieldMask
members.doc: Field mask of fields to update.

members.name: reactionIdentities
members.doc: List of reacted identities grouped by reaction code.

members.name: entityId
members.doc: ID of the entity associated with the event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether the event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (for example, [GDPR](https://support.wix.com/en/article/gdpr-frequently-asked-questions)). For advanced users.

members.name: postId
members.doc: ID of the post to delete.

members.name: expiresInMinutes
members.doc: The amount of minutes after which the pin will be removed (unpinned)

members.name: bestAnswerCommentId
members.doc:
ID of the best answer comment for this post (selected by forum admin or post owner).
Deprecated on '2022-08-24' use markedComments instead.

members.name: categoryId
members.doc: Category ID the post is listed under.

members.name: closed
members.doc: Whether post is closed and commenting is disabled.

members.name: commentInteraction
members.doc: Defines what interactions may be applied on the comment under the post, vote or like.

members.name: contentText
members.doc: The post content in plain text.

members.name: lastActivityDate
members.doc: Date of latest activity on this post (e.g., date the latest comment was added to post).

members.name: markedComments
members.doc: IDs of the marked comment for this post (selected by forum admin or post owner).

members.name: pinned
members.doc: Whether the post is pinned. Places the post at the top of the post list.

members.name: reactionIdentities
members.doc: List of reaction identities grouped by reaction code.

members.name: recentActivity
members.doc: Recent activity of post (e.g., activity of the latest comment was added to post).

members.name: extraFields
members.doc: Array of extra post fields to be added in the response.

members.name: post
members.doc: Post for the provided post ID.

members.name: extraFields
members.doc: Array of extra post fields to be added in the response.

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc:
Records can be sorted by:
lastActivityDate
createdDate
commentCount
viewCount
likeCount
isPinned

members.name: order
members.doc: Records can be sorted in ascending (default) or descending order.

members.name: extraFields
members.doc: Array of extra post fields to be added in the response.

members.name: sort
members.doc: Array of sort objects (e.g.,  [{ fieldName: createdDate, order: Order.ASC }] ).

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of records that match the filters.

members.name: count
members.doc: Total number of reacted identities count.

members.name: reactionIdentities
members.doc: List of reacted identities grouped by reaction code.

members.name: commentId
members.doc: ID of the "best answer" comment on the post.

members.name: fieldMask
members.doc: Field mask of fields to update.

members.name: post
members.doc: Post data with partial data to update.

members.name: postId
members.doc: ID of the post to update.

members.name: format
members.doc: Video format for example, mp4, hls.
